entityCreateInvalidParameter: Invalid parameter occured while processing a new entity object instance
sessionEntityInvalidParameter: Invalid parameter occured while instantiating a new session object instance
csrfTokenMissing: The CSRF token could not be located in the session data
csrfOriginError: The origin of the given CSRF token does not match the original CSRF token
csrfTokenDoesNotMatch: The given CSRF token does not match the original CSRF token
csrfTokenExpired: The given CSRF token has passed it's expiration and is no longer valid
